BackstoryDef.title: Mystery Kurin
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s childhood is a mystery.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Orphan
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were killed by humans when [PAWN_pronoun] was young. [PAWN_pronoun] got PTSD after that, and has gone through psychiatric treatment for many years. [PAWN_pronoun] is mostly fine nowadays, but sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] suffers from nightmares about that day.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Young Maid
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents lost their entire wealth in an unfortunate accident and got a lot of debt. But fortunately, a noble took pity on them and hired [PAWN_nameDef] as a housemaid. In the noble's mansion, [PAWN_pronoun] mostly did household chores and sometimes took care of the noble's daughter, and eventually became friends with her.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Vigilante
BackstoryDef.description: The Vigilante Fox Squad was one of the most popular TV animations among young Kurins. [PAWN_nameDef] gathered some friends and created their own vigilante squad. They patrolled fields and alleys, and considered themselves as peacekeeping guardians of the local city. But since public security was good, there was not much to do.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Lonely Child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a rare blue-eyed child. Since this was a ominous sign among Kurin culture, [PAWN_pronoun] grew up as a lonely child, shunned by everyone from children to adults.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Trouble Maker
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was envied by some children, but was also an absolute headache for teachers. Everyone was terrified because of [PAWN_nameDef]'s villainy, including skipping cleaning duty, not listening to teachers, or tracking in mud.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Slum Orphan
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent childhood wandering through alleyways, eating moldy bread. There was a facility to help orphans, but after the Republic of Kurin devoted all of its resources into building migration ships, [PAWN_pronoun] did not receive proper welfare benefits and lived in a cardboard box house built in an alley.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Ball Catcher
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] really loved baseball, so [PAWN_pronoun] went to human nations and watched every baseball game [PAWN_pronoun] could afford. As [PAWN_pronoun] watched every game, she frequently got caught on the camera, and was eventually picked up by the team to became a ball catcher.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Zookeeper
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a poor family because [PAWN_pronoun] had many siblings. So [PAWN_pronoun] became a self-supporting student, working a part-time job at the zoo as to pay for [PAWN_pronoun] tuition fees. Despite the job, [PAWN_pronoun] didn't neglect studying.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Lazy child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] got really tired of everything, so [PAWN_pronoun] just sat in a room and played games day and night. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't care about friends either. As [PAWN_pronoun] didn't wash often, [PAWN_pronoun] room smelled bad too. [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were very worried about their child.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Ordinary Child
BackstoryDef.description: Born in an average middle class family, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up fine, warmly loved by their parents. Like other children, [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed having fun and eating sweet cakes. Their grades were neither really good or bad, but [PAWN_pronoun] was a generous child who took care of their friends.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Pro Gamer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s gaming skills were unmatched by anyone. [PAWN_pronoun] always kept top ten ranking, and [PAWN_pronoun] even won the championship in several competitions. But whenever internet connection went bad, [PAWN_pronoun] became really sad and refused to do anything.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Country Kid
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent childhood with nature: picking mushrooms from the mountains, chasing cats in the fields, or fishing at the river. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] got little sunburns, but she grew healthy regardless.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin City Kid
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the downtown of the Kurin metropolis with plenty of things to do: movies, arcades, and so on. But most of all, [PAWN_nameDef]'s favorite thing to do was traveling with her family.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Young Cartoonist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loved drawing and had talent. When [PAWN_pronoun] started drawing, [PAWN_pronoun] concentrated so much that [PAWN_pronoun] didn't notice others at all. Even during their school days, she was often scolded by her teacher, but her passion couldn't be stopped.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Single-tail syndrome
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with one tail unlike others. Life was not impaired at all, but slow growth made [PAWN_nameDef] look younger than her peers. When she was young, she was teased a lot, but as she grew older, she became more popular with cuter looks than other Kurins.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Timid Child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a very scared child. Everywhere was full of scary things: the shadows of the night, the small sounds that you hear when you sleep. [PAWN_pronoun] often got surprised by honking geese. [PAWN_pronoun] was always too scared to fight back.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Affectionate Child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a friendly child. [PAWN_pronoun] had always listened to their friends and sincerely comforted their friends when they had bad days.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Poor Child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had a poor childhood. Both parents returned home late at night, and [PAWN_pronoun] grew up a little earlier than others as [PAWN_pronoun] left was alone in the daytime. [PAWN_pronoun]'s dream was to make a lot of money and studied hard to make her dreams come true.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Cafe Child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] helped her parents cafe after school. [PAWN_pronoun] took orders and did cleaning. Some regular customers often gave some tips. With that, [PAWN_pronoun] bought ice cream or saved money.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Tofu House Daughter
BackstoryDef.description: The family of [PAWN_nameDef] has made tofu in the traditional way for over 100 years at their family store. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up learning their mother's teaching that one should make their tofu with all their heart, regardless of flavor preferences.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Red-light District Runner
BackstoryDef.description: It is illegal in the Republic of Kurin to hire young children to work in red-light districts. However, [PAWN_nameDef] touted other Kurins in the red-light districts or running errands at convenience stores, and gained a lot of money as a child. Since [PAWN_pronoun] was a clever, cunning child, and she was able to easily avoid crackdowns.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Young Crafter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has better dexterity than others. [PAWN_pronoun] loved to make cute handicrafts and share them with friends, and their trinkets were always popular among friends.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Young Gardener
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] loved everything about plants. Whenever [PAWN_pronoun] had spare time, [PAWN_pronoun] went to the farm and looked after crops, or [PAWN_pronoun] went to the nearest botanical garden.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Young Chef
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had fun baking bread and cookies or decorating cakes. [PAWN_pronoun] always got praised in cooking class, and soon after [PAWN_pronoun] discovered a talent in other dishes. From simple meal to lavish cuisine, [PAWN_pronoun] could make all sorts of dishes.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Animal Lover
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] really loved animals. [PAWN_pronoun] would like to raise as many as animals [PAWN_pronoun] can, but due to realistic problems, [PAWN_pronoun] had no choice but to raise a robot pet. However, [PAWN_pronoun] liked the warmth of real living animals than robots, and often went to the zoo.

BackstoryDef.title: Smart Student
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s grades were better than other students. Exam scores have always been high, and relationships with other friends have been good. However, [PAWN_nameDef]'s body became weak as [PAWN_pronoun] spent a long time sitting at their desk, and it became common for them to sit quietly in the corner in PE classes.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Versatile Child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was talented in various fields such as studying, cooking, crating, and sports, but it rather made [PAWN_pronoun] difficult to focus on one field. [PAWN_pronoun] wandered for a while to find her career.

BackstoryDef.title: Bookworm
BackstoryDef.description: The small sound of turning the page, smell of old paper... [PAWN_nameDef] loved reading books with their reading lights on and their room was full of books. [PAWN_nameDef] often spent all day reading books in an old library.

BackstoryDef.title: First Kurin
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the first Kurin pioneers. When their ship made it onto the new planet, [PAWN_pronoun] was unable to wake up for hundreds of years due to a fault in the cryptosleep casket. Only recently did Kurin master the cryptosleep technology and [PAWN_pronoun] finally woke up.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Foreign Student
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a foreign student in the human nations, and has been away from parents since [PAWN_pronoun] was a child. Fortunately, the school [PAWN_pronoun] attended was a place with good children and teachers, and [PAWN_pronoun] was able to grow up as an outgoing, warm-hearted fox.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Young Musician
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a young fox who loved music and loved to sing with friends. [PAWN_pronoun] became more and more entertained by music as [PAWN_pronoun] composed own songs and music, and even got good responses from others. But their parents were not particularly happy about that.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Child Actor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was renowned for excellent acting skills and rich emotional expression despite a young age. [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to appear in many movies and dramas, and [PAWN_pronoun] was able to learn various skills while acting in various genres.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Outgoing Student
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been popular among friends for cute looks and bright, cheerful personality. Later on, [PAWN_pronoun] became a celebrity, but since [PAWN_pronoun] couldn't play or live freely with friends as before, [PAWN_pronoun] felt lonely after all. Not long after, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to retire and return to normal life.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Martial Art Trainee
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a wimp, weaker than peers. [PAWN_pronoun] began to practice several sports and martial arts to overcome this. [PAWN_pronoun] worked hard and has become strong enough to win regional competitions.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Scout
BackstoryDef.description: The young [PAWN_nameDef] had a great yearning for the children's scouts. [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents bought uniforms for their child despite their poverty, and [PAWN_pronoun] was able to join the Scouts and spent happy days learning various skills such as camping, botany and survival.

BackstoryDef.title: Kurin Athlete
BackstoryDef.description: Unlike most Kurins, [PAWN_nameDef] loved to move, and joined the school's athletic club to do various sports. PE class was a solo stage of [PAWN_nameDef], and [PAWN_pronoun] was considerate enough to help the ones who were bullied. But unfortunately, [PAWN_nameDef]'s grades were not really good.
